message: I wonder how many of you throwing stones live in glass houses. Be careful stones have a way of bouncing back and cracking your own foundation.

defenses, defenses does this mean it's okay to profit from the misery in Ukraine? to take money from oligarchs connected to the Odessa Mafia? what about Paul Fucking Kagame? then again it's no shocker, is it? the bitch was a Goldwater Girl, stumped for Nixon, and - her hubby deregulated Wall Street - killed TANF - enacted NAFTA - while he publicly called Suharto """"our kind of guy"""" - and his lieutenant said that murdering NO LESS THAN the established figure of a half-million civilians in Iraq, largely women and children, WITHOUT FIRING A SINGLE BULLET was """"worth it"""". get a grip, neoliberals and stop hijacking what remains of the true left. 's trying to help here. if it's shameless pandering you crave, head on over to CNN or MSNBC. they'll entertain you all day and all night.

Dear God, can't you people separate your personal, anecdotal experiences, from the aggregate data that is accumulated by the studies. Have you not heard the phrase """"exception to the rule."""" I'm glad your formula fed baby is smart, but that doesn't negate the conclusions drawn from the study. The inability to recognize this is incredibly self centered and reflects a serious lack of critical thinking ability.
